ARABIC: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ قَالَ يَٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He was told, 'Enter the Garden!' He said, 'If my people only knew
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (But they stoned him to death.) It was said to him: "Enter Paradise;" and he said: "If only my people knew
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Eventually they killed him and he was told): “Enter Paradise.” The man exclaimed: “Would that my people knew
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Having been murdered by the disbelievers) he was told to enter paradise
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It was said to him, “Enter Paradise”; he said, “If only my people knew!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It was said: "Enter Paradise." He said: "Would that my people knew."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: It was said: Enter the garden. He said: O would that my people had known
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It was said, 'Enter Paradise!' He said, 'Ah, would that my people had knowledge
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It was said (unto him): Enter paradise. He said: Would that my people knew
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We said to him, "Enter paradise," and he exclaimed: "Would that my people knew
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It was said: enter thou the Garden. He said: would that my people knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He was told, ‘Enter paradise!’ He said, ‘Alas! Had my people only known
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It was said: "Enter thou the Garden." He said: "Ah me! Would that my People knew (what I know)!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It was said (to him when the disbelievers killed him): "Enter Paradise." He said: "Would that my people knew!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It was said (to him): 'Enter Paradise' and he said: 'Would that my people knew
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It was said, “Enter Paradise.” He said, “If only my people knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:26] It was said, to him upon his death: ‘Enter Paradise!’ — but it is also said that he entered it while he was [still] alive. He said, ‘O (yā is for calling attention [to something]), would that my people knew
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It was said (unto him): Enter Paradise) Paradise was decreed for him; it is also said: it was said to his spirit: enter Paradise. (He said) his spirit said after entering Paradise: (Would that my people knew) and believed
